enabled.label: Enable plugin
enabled.comment: Is the overall Boxalino plugin active (global switch)?

account_name.label: Boxalino account name
account_name.comment: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com

password.label: Boxalino password
password.comment: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com

dev.label: Dev
dev.comment: Is the account a development account or a production account? (Yes=DEV, No=PROD)

domain.label: Domain
domain.comment: What is your domain (e.g.: www.myshop.com)? Used to store cookie information about session id and visitor id.

apiKey.label: ApiKey
apiKey.comment: API Token (value for the new set-up)

apiSecret.label: ApiSecret
apiSecret.comment: API Password (value for the new set-up)

host.label: Host
host.comment: Uses default value "cdn.bx-cloud.com" if left empty; Use "main.bx-cloud.com" for the new set-up.

send_request_id.label: Set request ID on client
send_request_id.comment: Sending a request UUID allows tracking on our server if the request arrived. To only be used when an issue has been identified. Constraint: only for PHP 7.0 or more.

p13n_username.label: P13n Username
p13n_username.comment: Optional: uses default credentials if left empty

p13n_password.label: P13n Password
p13n_password.comment: Optional: uses default credentials if left empty

language.label: Overwrite language
language.comment: Optional: uses store's "general/locale/code" value by default

username.label: Boxalino User name
username.comment: Optional: leave empty to use account name as username (typical case)

entity_id.label: Id field name
entity_id.comment: Optional: specify special field name for search and recommendation grouping

additional_fields.label: Returned fields
additional_fields.comment:
Optional: Write here comma-separated names of fields in Boxalino response Colon separate option:
-global (without language version)
-local (with language version)

thrift_timeout.label: Timeout limit to our server
thrift_timeout.comment: Optional: default value is 2 seconds and should normally not be changed.

timeout.label: Boxalino Response Wait Time
timeout.comment: Optional: Keeping connection open to DI server in order to wait for processing the archive for any errors. Default set to 3000(sec).

local_tmp.label: Local Temporary Archive Path
local_tmp.comment: If set, the exported archive will be temporary stored in that path; If empty, the archive will be created in the directory PHP stores temporary files by default. You can find out which one is it via sys_get_temp_dir().

extra_tables.label: Extra Tables
extra_tables.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the products entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

include_properties.label: List of product properties to include in export
include_properties.comment: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

exclude_properties.label: List of product properties to exclude from export
exclude_properties.comment: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of product properties to include is not empty.

export_images.label: Enable export product images
export_images.comment: Optional: Export image and thumbnail image urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations in Magento, as Magento renders the images itself). If activated, makes export slower.

export_url.label: Enable export product urls
export_url.comment: Optional: Export product urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations in Magento, as Magento renders the url itself).. If activated, makes export slower.

extra_tables.label: Extra Tables
extra_tables.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the customers entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

include_properties.label: List of customer properties to include in export
include_properties.comment: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

exclude_properties.label: List of customer properties to exclude from export
exclude_properties.comment: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of customer properties to include is not empty.

extra_tables.label: Extra Tables
extra_tables.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the transactions entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

include_properties.label: List of transaction properties to include in export
include_properties.comment: Optional: list of transaction properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

exclude_properties.label: List of transaction properties to exclude from export
exclude_properties.comment: Optional: list of transaction properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of transaction properties to include is not empty.

export_mode.label: Export mode
export_mode.comment: Choose how the transactions should be exported. For Incremental, the exporter will only export the last month.

export_server.label: Boxalino export server
export_server.comment: Optional: http://di1.bx-cloud.com by default if left empty

publish_configuration_changes.label: Publish configuration changes automatically
publish_configuration_changes.comment: True by default. Any changes in product/customers/transaction properties will be automatically validated. For safety, it is recommended to de-activate this option once in production to make sure no unwanted changes are automatically published. However, if not activated, changes in the configuration will not be considered until published otherwise and, in the case of property deletions, the data sync might fail until the changes are published. Publishing of the configuration can be done by re-activating this option and running a full data sync again, or by publishing the configuration directly in Boxalino Data Intelligence web-admin.

curl_timeout.label: Boxalino CURL Timeout
curl_timeout.comment: Optional: 3600 (1 hour) by default if left empty

sort.label: Enable default sorting
sort.comment: Should the navigation use the relevance sorting as default?

show_category_facet.label: Show the child categories navigation view
show_category_facet.comment: Optional: set to "no" by default. If set to "yes" - the category facet will be displayed on navigation (default Magento)

redirect_on_category_filter.label: Redirect to category view on category select
redirect_on_category_filter.comment: Optional: set to "no" by default. If set to "yes" - when selecting a category filter on navigation panel - it will load the requested category.

enabled.label: Enable autocomplete
enabled.comment: Is Boxalino search as you type (autocomplete) active?

category.label: Enable autocomplete category suggestion
category.comment: Enable if the autocomplete should also provide category suggestions.

ranking.label: Category suggestion ranking
ranking.comment: Ranking of suggested categories. Possible values are: 'counter' (ordering by hit count), 'alphabetical'

level.label: Category suggestion min level
level.comment: Minimum level of suggested categories (e.g.: 0 = top categories, 1 = sub-categories, ...)

show_price.label: Show product price in autocomplete
show_price.comment: Option to display the product price in the autocomplete

limit.label: Limit of textual suggestions
limit.comment: Maximum number of search textual suggestions to display under the search bar while the user is typing

products_limit.label: Limit of product suggestions
products_limit.comment: Maximum number of product suggestions to display under the search bar while the user is typing

noresults.label: No result recommendation
noresults.comment: Widget configuration for recommendation on search page when no result is returned.

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

widget.label: Widget name
widget.comment: Optional: default value is "noresults" and should normally not be changed

search_choice_id.label: Search choice ID
search_choice_id.comment: Optional: default value is "search" and should normally not be changed

use_root_category_filter.label: Only show products tagged to a category
use_root_category_filter.comment: Optional: set to "no" by default. If set to "yes" - the products unrelated to categories will not appear in search results.

autocomplete_choice_id.label: Autocomplete choice ID
autocomplete_choice_id.comment: Optional: default value is "autocomplete" and should normally not be changed

navigation_choice_id.label: Navigation choice ID
navigation_choice_id.comment: Optional: default value is "navigation" and should normally not be changed

finder_choice_id.label: Finder choice ID
finder_choice_id.comment: Optional: default value is "productfinder" and should normally not be changed

search_sub_phrases_limit.label: Search limit for subphrases
search_sub_phrases_limit.comment: Optional: default value is 3 and should normally not be changed. If set to 0 - the toolbar limit will be used.

search_sub_phrases_toolbar.label: Toolbar on sub-phrases output
search_sub_phrases_toolbar.comment: Optional: default is set to no. When hidden, the products collection do not have the toolbar.

multiselect_fields.label: Multi-select Fields
multiselect_fields.comment: Optional: If you have fields which should behave as multi-select, you should define it here (separated by coma). As an option, you can also set if the field should use the AND condition (default OR condition), by appending a semicolon followed by a 1. E.g.: category_id,products_color;1,products_manufacturer

seo_filters.label: SEO-friendly filters mapping

parameter_separator.label: Separator for URL Parameter
parameter_separator.comment: Optional: default separator is ',' and should normally not be changed.

cart.label: Cart recommendation
cart.comment: Widget configuration for recommendation on basket page.

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

widget.label: Widget name
widget.comment: Optional: default value is "basket" and should normally not be changed

related.label: Product detail page: related recommendations
related.comment: Widget configuration for related recommendation on product page.

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

widget.label: Widget name
widget.comment: Optional: default value is "similar" and should normally not be changed

upsell.label: Product detail page: upsell recommendations
upsell.comment: Widget configuration for upsell recommendation on product page.

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items

widget.label: Widget name
widget.comment: Optional: default value is "complementary" and should normally not be changed

blog.label: Product detail page: blog recommendations
blog.comment: Widget configuration for blog recommendation on product page.

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items.

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: E.g.: if you want 4 recommendations (no more no less), then write 4 both on minimum and maximum recommended items.

widget.label: Widget name
widget.comment: Optional: default value is "read" and should normally not be changed.

excerptFieldName.label: Excerpt Fieldname
excerptFieldName.comment: Optional: default value is "products_blog_excerpt" and should normally not be changed.

linkFieldName.label: Link Fieldname
linkFieldName.comment: Optional: default value is "products_blog_link" and should normally not be changed

mediaUrlFieldName.label: Media Url Fieldname
mediaUrlFieldName.comment: Optional: default value is "products_blog_featured_media_url" and should normally not be changed.

dateFieldName.label: Date Fieldname
dateFieldName.comment: Optional: default value is "products_blog_date" and should normally not be changed.

extraFieldNames.label: Extra Fieldnames
extraFieldNames.comment: Optional: If you want some extra Elements in your Blog Recommendations you can enter the required field names here. (separated by comma)

blogArticleImageWidth.label: Blog Article Image Width
blogArticleImageWidth.comment: Set the width of the image that accompanies the blog.

blogArticleImageHeight.label: Blog Article Image Height
blogArticleImageHeight.comment: Set the height of the image that accompanies the blog.

others.label: Other recommendations Configuration
others.comment: Widget configuration for other recommendations on product page.

widget.label: Widget names
widget.comment: Optional: if you want to have other recommendations, list them by names here (separated by comma)

min.label: Minimum recommended items
min.comment: Optional: if define other recommendation widgets, list the minimum recommended items you want for each (separated by coma, same order)

max.label: Maximum recommended items
max.comment: Optional: if define other recommendation widgets, list the maximum recommended items you want for each (separated by coma, same order)

scenario.label: Types
scenario.comment: Optional: if define other recommendation types, for each one: on which page the recommendation appear (separated by coma, same order). Possible values: 'product' if appear on a product page, 'basket' if appear on the basket, 'category' if appear on a category page, 'search' if appear on a search page, 'others' in other cases.
